Latest Projects

Purrfect Pizza & Fish Delivery
Ludum Dare 53 Compo - Unity A 2D action infinite runner where the player is a cat that delivers pizza and fish to other cats. It has a timing circle that rewards the player the more precise they are with the delivery. The jam theme was Delivery and the game was made by myself in 48 hours from scratch.
